page.discussion: The .TYPE_GET() method returns the type of the index referenced by the object pointer. The index type can be:

item.name: a tag in an index file

section.title: Example
section.description: This script is attached to the OnPush event of a button on a form.
section.example: dim tbl as P dim idx as P dim idx_type as N tbl = table.current() idx = tbl.index_primary_get() idx_type = idx.type_get() select case idx_type = 2 ui_msg_box("type","index tag") case idx_type = 6 ui_msg_box("type","query") case idx_type = -1 ui_msg_box("type","Record number") end select
